mapper.insert: insert into LOAN_ORG_FUNCTION_CONSTRAINT (SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, OVERTIME, APPLYFREQUENCY, FUNCTIONTYPE, SUBUPLOADIMAGE, SUBAPPLYFRONT, SUBAPPLY, SUBWAITRESULT, SUBQUERYRESULT, SUBAPPLYPOST, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, FUNCTIONNAME, FUNCTIONONOFF, RELATIVETYPE) values (#{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativeserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyfrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functiontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subuploadimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subapplyfront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subapply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subwaitresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subqueryresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subapplypost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{functiononoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, OVERTIME, APPLYFREQUENCY, FUNCTIONTYPE, SUBUPLOADIMAGE, SUBAPPLYFRONT, SUBAPPLY, SUBWAITRESULT, SUBQUERYRESULT, SUBAPPLYPOST, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, FUNCTIONNAME, FUNCTIONONOFF, RELATIVETYPE from LOAN_ORG_FUNCTION_CONSTRAINT where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
